```{r include=F}
library(leaflet)
library(dplyr)
```

## Leaflet
Use the leaflet map below to explore.
```{r, class.source='fold-show'}
leaflet() %>% 
  setView(lng=-122.90486, lat=47.03576, zoom=16) %>% 
  addTiles() %>% 
  addMarkers(lng=-122.90486, lat=47.03576, popup="WA State Capitol")
```
